phrases: This arrow is very precious.
It is the only one there is.
It is my precious objective.
I just have to retrieve it.
Do not you dare pull out that arrow!
It will make him bleed even more!
Because my little brother's an idiot, I have to kill you now.
Which means it will not be good if something happens to this arrow.
If the lady next door happens to see it, or if it snaps in half, that would be bad news.
I am a very methodical type, you see,
so I want to make sure I put the arrow away properly.
When you are listening to CDs, you properly put the first one away in its case
before listening to the second one, right?
Everyone is like that.
I am like that, too.
Oh?
You are going to come into this house?
Think before you speak!
If I do not come in, I cannot kick your ass and treat Koichi's wounds!
Bro!
I have not lost yet!
Hold off on attacking him!
Attack?
We are not finished yet!
Something is coming from...
the darkness of the ceiling!
Jojo's Bizarre Adventure
Diamond is Unbreakable
Episode 4 The Nijimura Brothers, Part 2
Okuyasu...
How stupid you are never ceases to amaze me.
If you had not come staggering in here,
my Worse Company would have attacked Josuke for sure.
And you actually walked into its attack trajectory.
Bro...
Your Stand, The Hand, is terrifying, but you are completely incompetent.
I told you over and over, ever since we were kids,
that incompetent people drag down everyone around them, did not I?
I told you over and over that people only have the right to live
if they keep growing, did not I?
What is with his injuries?
What kind of attack makes you end up with wounds like that?
Anyway, it seems that something is up there.
Little brother,
I think it is only natural that morons like you should die!
It left a ton of holes again!
What kind of attack is that?
Shining Diamond!
Are you trying to attack your brother, too?!
Josuke Higashikata...
I am sure he will not abandon this brat he called Koichi.
He will most likely come in here again.
I will kill him, no matter what...
I will kill anyone who gets in the way of this bow and arrow's objective,
no matter who they may be!
Now, then...
How about you tell me about your brother's Stand?
Tell me what his Stand really is!
If you tell me, I will treat your wounds.
Like hell...
I am going to tell you...
Dumbass...
As I thought.
Well, then...
I guess I have no choice!
I am going to go in there again, so just do not get in my way, Okuyasu.
Koichi does not have much time!
His Stand attacks from somewhere within this darkness.
Going in here is pretty dangerous.
I have got no choice but to use all of my senses fully...
Hey, wait a minute!
Huh?
Why, Josuke?
Why did you treat my wounds?
Shut up.
I will tell you later.
I might attack you!
I am your enemy!
You want a piece of me?
After I hear your answer!
Why did you treat my wounds?
I am not very smart, so you are going to have to tell me!
And that wound on your hand!
You got that when you were pulling me outside, did not you?
I want to know why you went through all that to save me.
There is no deep reason.
There is no reason he has to die.
That is what I thought back there.
Koichi...
The trail leads upstairs.
I still have more questions, Josuke!
What is your problem?!
I am begging you, just let me save Koichi!
Why?!
Why do not you use your Stand's powers to fix your own hand?
You should just fix it up like you did with my face.
My Shining Diamond cannot repair my own wounds.
It just means life is not that easy.
And, more than anything,
I have no way of saving people who have already died.
Let me just say one thing, Okuyasu.
If Koichi dies, I do not know what I am going to do to your brother.
So do not hold it against me.
It was your brother who caused all this trouble.
You got that?
If you do, stay outside.
Koichi!
Damn it...
This is definitely a trap.
He plans to attack me from somewhere as soon as I get close to Koichi.
But...
Even if I know it is a trap, I have no choice but to go!
Koichi does not even have seconds left!
What?!
Okuyasu, you bastard!
Josuke!
Gyaon
Koichi just...
Because I am stupid, I just act on what is in my heart.
Just once, just this once, I will repay my debt to you.
I will not do anything else.
I will not help out my Bro, or do anything to you, either.
This is it.
That is just great, Okuyasu.
Hey, you were in great danger, Koichi.
I am glad you came to.
How many fingers am I holding up?
Five...
I-I got my head trapped between the gates,
and then, uh... um...
Wh-Where are we?
That dangerous situation we were in earlier is not over yet, Koichi.
I want to go down those stairs and go outside,
but I wonder if Okuyasu's brother will let us do that safely...
There is definitely something up there.
Something is lurking in the shadows of the ceiling.
What is that?
Something really fast just went by.
Josuke, what is going on?
Koichi, I am sure you have no idea what is going on right now.
For now, do not ask any questions, and get closer to me.
Earlier, it was creepy because I could not see it,
but I feel a bit more at ease now that I have seen it.
It just looks like a shrimp with very little power.
This battle's going to end with me sending Shining Diamond
after that shrimp the next time it pops up.
There you are!
What the heck?
There is a ton of them!
And that uniform...
Burn
Wh-What is...
A bunch of guys that look like toy soldiers are falling...
Are these Okuyasu's brother's Stand?
Ow!
You bastard!
I guess attacking two or three will not do enough damage.
And the wounds are small, but their destructive power is the real thing.
We are sure to get seriously hurt if we fight these things.
Since Okuyasu decided to meddle and save that brat,
my plan's been derailed.
But they will not be leaving this house...
Nor will they leave my Stand, Worse Company's, battlefield.
Wo
Wor
Worse
Worse Co
Worse Com
Worse Compa
Worse Company
Kei
Keicho
Keicho Niji
Keicho Nijimura
Worse Company?
Josuke, wh-what is...
Do not ask questions.
I am sure you do not get it, but just shut up and stay back!
We are in real trouble right now!
All units, halt!
Ready, aim...
Fire!
Left face!
Fire!
As I thought, that is enough destructive power to blow off
our limbs if they hit us head-on!
Lucky!
There are some windows.
Koichi, this is the second floor,
but we are going to bust out those windows and dive out.
I guess I was a bit naIve...
Just great...
They have helicopters, too?
Those look like the American army's Apache helicopters.
Look out!
There is a tank!
You are right.
They have tanks, too.
Koichi, be caref
What?
Wh-What did you just say, Koichi?
Can you see them?
These soldiers, tanks, and helicopters...
You can see them clearly?
Yeah.
I am not sure what is going on, but I can see them.
Could it be that since you were shot by that arrow, you became a Stand user?
Oh?
So the little shrimp
has the power to use a Stand now?
There you are, Okuyasu's big bro.
You have got some guts, showing yourself like that!
My Stand, Worse Company, has unbreakable defense.
It is an army that will not let any invader leave alive.
I am sure you want to beat me...
But I can tell you right now that your Shining Diamond's attacks
will never reach me.
Look!
Do you see my army's beautiful formation?
All units, maintain battle formation!
At ease!
It feels so good when they are so beautifully together.
Though I am a bit pissed off that their formation is
a little off, since you killed two or three of them.
You sure are methodical.
You came out here just to explain that?
No, the reason I came out here
is to watch you, brat.
M-Me?
That is right.
Koichi, was it?
It seems, despite my expectations, you had the aptitude to be a Stand user.
Make your Stand appear right now, and show me what it can do.
You might have the ability that I have been looking for.
If you have that ability, I will let you live.
B-But...
The ability you are looking for?
What the hell are you after?
You are in no position to be asking questions, Josuke!
My decision to kill you has not changed!
Be thankful that you get to live a bit longer.
That is just great.
Hey, what are you doing?
Make your Stand appear, brat!
S-Stand?
I have no idea what is going on...
Oh?
It is your first time?
I see!
Fine!
Josuke, show him how to make a Stand appear!
Huh?
Your Shining Diamond's range is less than one meter.
If that shrimp's Stand's ability is able to compensate for yours,
you might be able to escape my Company.
True...
It would be great if it is a Stand that can kick your ass.
Okay, getting your Stand to come out is easy, Koichi.
You just need to feel like
you want to protect yourself, or you want to kick his ass.
Huh?
The rest is just instinct.
A Stand that is unique to your mentality should come out.
W-Wait!
I cannot understand all this out of nowhere!
You do not understand?
Then I guess we will just have to put you in a situation that makes you!
Do it, Green Beret!
Boom
What?!
That is...
Hey, Koichi, try moving it.
M-Move what?
That Stand!
Stand?
I-I made this appear?!
What happens after this?
What kind of abilities does this egg-shaped thing have?
Abilities?
I am sorry to disappoint you, but this is all I can do!
This is it!
What?
That is it?!
This Stand...
That is enough!
That is all I need to know!
All units, battle positions!
Koichi, withdraw your Stand.
If they attack that thing, you will die, too!
Withdraw?
How do I make it withdraw?!
Commence attack!
Kablow
J-Josuke!
Good.
Now Koichi and Josuke have been separated.
The crack in that egg...
The brat has not realized it yet, but it might be something worthwhile.
The only one who is going to die right now is Josuke.
Ow...
Hey, Okuyasu's big bro,
if you are going to use an attack flashy enough to destroy this house,
I am going to do the same.
Let us make this just great.
Josuke Higashikata...
Is it true that you hate it when anyone says anything insulting about your hair?
Why do not you try insulting it?
Just to test that out.
No, there is no need.
Because I am going to declare that I will
blow off the head that your hair sits on.
First, my Worse Company is going to shoot your legs.
You will not be able to run away then.
Next, we will damage your arm.
Then you will not be able to guard yourself.
And then, I declare that I am going to blow your brains out, along with your hair.
I see.
That is a flawless plan...
If you ignore the fact that it is impossible!
I am very methodical, you see.
If I say I will do something in a certain order, I will.
That is what a declaration is.
He is wide open...
I just need to make that Stand thing appear again.
It is only an egg-looking thing, but if I can make it ram into him,
I might be able to beat him!
I-I am going to do it!
Be confident!
I am going to beat him!
I am very interested in your Stand,
so I will not kill you just yet.
You bastard!
All units, charge!
Just like Moses, who parted the Red Sea and walked across its floor,
I am going to make my way through this army and beat you down!
You fool!
My plan is going exactly as I have declared,
Josuke Higashikata!
A l-landmine?!
First, damage to your legs!
And now, Apaches, fire your missiles!
My arm...
First your legs, then your arm.
It feels so good when things go as I have declared.
Let us see if you can stay in one piece as my Worse Company
fires all its missiles, shells, and rounds into that damaged arm of yours!
You have lost, Josuke Higashikata!
All units!
Get ready to fire at once!
What do you think you are doing, Josuke Higashikata?
Are you surrendering?
Are you asking me to let you go?
That is not happening.
All units, fire!
My plan is already finished.
What?!
My missiles that just attacked Josuke's arm...
Did you forget?
My Shining Diamond can repair what is been destroyed.
If you forgot, then write it down.
You know, methodically.
Episode 5 The Nijimura Brothers, Part 3
Episode 5 The Niji mura Brothers, Part 3
